channel.title: [pi] lunar magics[edited] help
channel.description:
so i added daggs but when i hit it i hit a zero everytime, doesnt matter what gear i have itds always a zero
spawn = 2881 2486 10127 0 0 0 0 0 dagg
and its max hit def and att are all 0 so can anybody tell me why, and how to fix it. also i added assault so how do i set up my shop to were it has fighter hat, torso, rune defender. and needing assault points to buy those items.

item.title: [pi] lunar magics[edited] help
item.dc:creator: @RuneLive RuneLive
item.description:
@RuneLive wrote:

This is my command to switch lunars:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("switch")) { if (c.inWild()) return; try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int spellbook = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); if (spellbook == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else if (spellbook == 1) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else if (spellbook == 2) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } } catch (Exception e){} }

Sidebar interfaces id = 29999.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] lunar magics[edited] help
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

if(playerCommand.equals("lunars"))
     c.setSidebarInterface(6, XXXXX);

There, now figure out the correct ID.

Read full topic

case 6552: if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.setSidebarInterface(6, ?????); c.sendMessage("lunar magics fill your mind."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your memory."); c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } break;

item.title: [pi] lunar magics[edited] help
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

You need to make the assault points into currency as such. Createa new method for buying and selling which are duplicates of the originals but instead of checking if the player has enough money(item check), check if enough points have been earned.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] lunar magics[edited] help
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Syntax:

spawn = NPC_ID X_COORDINATE Y_COORDINATE WALK HEIGHT MAX_HIT ATTACK DEFENCE DESCRIPTION
The WALK constant is either 1 or 0. 1 allowing the NPC to roam freely over a 3x3 area. (3x3 by default, though it may be different.) 0 meaning the NPC will stay there.

Read full topic
